message: I have a 50 mage on Ashtone, PvP server, with Hammer and Root (though they don't play much anymore)  I'd be happy to move servers to join others if people are still playing.
I still talk to some of the old FoH kids.  they still play Rift.  Want me to see what server they are on?
Reclaimer server, Defiant.  Miang, Noah, Mystique and Ssin are all there, among others.  pretty sure that's the main server of FoH proper, as well.
I just cancelled my rift account.  No one to play with
